name: yup
content:

yes: "Can you see it?" "Yup, there it is." Is she the world's best actress? Yup, according to thousands of voters in our readers' poll.
More examplesFewer examples"Are you coming?" "Yup. Just give me a minute.""Yup," he said. "That's the one."Yup, everything's fine."Shall we go?" "Yup, I'm ready, let's go."I said "Daddy, did you read the letter?" He said yup.Yup, cowboy hats are back in fashion again.

(spelled the way it is spoken) yes: "Can you see it?" "Yup, there it is."
